Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{3: 'The dark sky, crimson phantoms, and the blood river form a picture of the inferno.'}
{3: 'Their whispers are filled with hatred, protesting about the young man who is rushing by.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: 'You could have saved us.'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: "You were chosen, but you ran away from your responsibilities. Why wouldn't you save us?"}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: 'Why? Why? Why did you leave?'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: 'Save me... Save me, Shrek...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{3: 'The young man stops running and turns toward the Red Tide projection.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory276.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'I\'m a Task Force "defector." If we\'re meeting at an Ascendant base... I assume we\'re all the same.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'Why did you defect?', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Ha... Are you surprised that I chose an unlikely way to live instead of a likely way to die?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I heard that failing the filtering will turn you into a Corrupted.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "I have to try, right? What's your name, by the way?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Everyone calls me Shrek.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Shrek? Haha! My apologies—I think that name has to be associated with some ogreish monster!', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'But I suppose there\'s nothing wrong with calling you a "monster" when you\'re the Construct the Ascendants are "feeding" in a jail cell.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Well, then. Let\'s hope we both pass the filtering, Mr. "Monster"!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory453.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You want to know what the filtering actually is?'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "It's a test to select our comrades. From what your memories have shown me... it's akin to how the human conservation areas choose their skilled workers.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "People don't turn into Corrupted if the conservation areas don't choose them.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Are you sure? Abandoned, they become Scavengers who linger on, searching, looting, and stealing resources and livelihoods in a broken world.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "They take, and one day they'll die when someone else takes from them.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Don't worry. I don't want to blame anyone... and I won't despise any.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "The world is taken over by the Punishing Virus. They don't have a choice. They are forced to become who they are.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'I simply want to put an end to their suffering sooner.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Best if they pass the filtering and become one of us, but I have somewhere they can go if they don't.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Ascendant smiles and points at the reservoir of the underground waterways. A crimson liquid is swirling with corpses and remains inside as if a monster that will not stop gnawing.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The female Construct who was smiling at him earlier is within it too. She has long become one of its phantoms, repeating her plea before dying with faint, broken words.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: 'Save me... Save me, Shrek...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory453.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'See? Those who become one with this crimson sea are not dead. Their lives have begun anew.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "But I'm sure it's hard for you to comprehend this way.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Ascendant scoops up some of the Red Tide and delivers it before Noan.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Their minds and data are not gone. They're all stored here.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "They're searching for each other, becoming whole from the pain of their loss...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Red Tide feeds the hungry and unites the departed... It takes away all the doom and gloom, and stitches together all their joy.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'She lets them gather and decompose, turning them into the creature of "order" Mister wants when we arrange them or a host of "chaos" when they come together freely...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'Those lives and minds are hardly what they were.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Better than the completely rotten shells they would've been.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Noan... No—I think I prefer "Shrek". The monster\'s name sounds more like one of us.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You should hate this world as much as I do, this world that keeps churning out dead bodies one after another. You should want to change it as well.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "I don't want to force you to choose. I can give you more time if you're still undecided.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Mister said... you'd only become a threat if we made you one of us against your will.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'So, I\'m only going to "guide" you. I\'ll never force you to do anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Oh... by the way, if you're thinking about saving those who are still alive... why don't you try out your new powers?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Exactly... You're wondering when that happened, aren't you? Hehe...", 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "I made you. You've retained your mind, and nothing's broken for once.", 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'So I borrowed Mister\'s access and planted some "magic" in you.', 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "As long as you stay near me, you don't have to fear the Punishing Virus. Instead, it can become your strength.", 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'You can read the information stored within the Red Tide. You can see the dead, save the living, and kill whoever you want to kill.', 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "That won't be necessary. I'm good.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "You don't want to save those people?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Then why won't you agree?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "I'll never be your accomplice.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{3: 'Fragments of his broken memories begin to connect, slightly dispelling the fog in his mind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'I rejected the offer, but what happened afterward?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "If you leave me, you'll slowly lose control of yourself until you become a monster that hurts other people.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'Wait. Why did I reject it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "If I don't use those powers to hurt people, I won't become an accomplice to the Ascendants.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "But there's the danger of losing control...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young man turns to the Red Tide projection once more.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'What am I missing...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: "It's too late, Shrek."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{3: 'The distorting projection struggles to hold together, repeating the words a woman said to the approaching man.'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: "That's what it always says... in my book."}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: 'A bird that was born in a cage will fear the sky; a goose that soars to the air will fear the cage. Humans can only make choices based on what they know...'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: 'And someone without a past—someone who runs from it—is destined to be lost on the way to the future.'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: "Don't you remember? This is the second time we've met."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: "...It's been too long."}
